title: Crafts & Tools - Sound Effects
description: Make your craft game come to life with this sounds :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


By purchasing this pack you automatically have access to more than 200 files related to crafts and tools, a very useful pack for games of this style, all files were recorded and edited in high quality equipment to provide you with great sound effects.


Don't get attached to the name

It's important to mention that I named the files according to the visual reference when I created them, however they easily fit into other actions and you can use them freely, with creativity these sound effects can be used in various actions.


Separate layers.

In the vast majority of folders you receive the complete sound effect and its layers, thus allowing you to assemble hundreds of other sound effects using this pack, this is an artifice that adds a lot of value to this pack


Helping each other

By purchasing this pack you help me to continue bringing quality content at an affordable price to the community. :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 246

Number of Audio Cues: 246

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contain 'loop' on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay/unsplash.
